title: C++ Level 10 â€” STL (Vectors, Sets, Maps) & Problem Solving
intro: This level introduces key STL containers and applies C++ concepts to solve problems.
points: Use std::vector for dynamic arrays in real problems.
Understand std::set and std::map at a basic level.
Use range-based for loops and auto keyword for convenience.
Combine loops, functions, and STL containers to solve problems.
Practice reading problems carefully and designing efficient solutions.
